EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Attunity/Wellcare_Q215.Reminder day before
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tomorrow: Pivotal Customer Spotlight Webinar with WellCare and Attunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
See you tomorrow for the Pivotal Customer Spotlight Webinar with WellCare and Attunity at 10:00AM PDT. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, June 30, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PDT/5:00PM GMT
Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1006866/D693E6D35C4BF71B41AB15D6653FA757> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date-Attunity-Wellcare:default=edit me}} We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
